body.name: Chefman 12-Cup Programmable Coffee Maker, Electric Brewer, Auto Shut Off, Digital Display w/Auto-Brew Function, Anti-Drip Pot, Reusable Filter for Fresh Grounds, Square Stainless Steel, Glass Carafe
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
features: Note: 1)Too coarse a grind, too little coffee, or insufficiently tamping the grounds before brewing can all lead to inadequate pressure for a proper brew. 2)It is important to note that the amount of espresso extracted will vary depending on the grind size and amount and reprogramming may be needed when the size and amount are adjusted

BREW YOUR WAY: Cutting-edge technology ensures coffee brews exactly how you like it, when you like it. Program your Chefman Coffee Maker to begin brewing at a set time up to 24 hours in advance. Stainless steel finish and dishwasher-safe parts allow for easy cleanup and a beautiful look.
NO MESS NO STRESS: Anti-drip function makes it easy for drinking at home or on the go with no spills along the way. Dishwasher-safe parts make cleanup a breeze at any time of the day.
CONSCIOUS COFFEE: Included reusable coffee filter allows for easy set-up and clean-up. Enjoy the satisfaction of making a conscious choice by cutting out plastic coffee pods and single-use filters.
PAUSE and SERVE: Never wait for your coffee to finish brewing with the pause and serve function. Sip a steaming cup of your favorite coffee mess-free while the rest of your pot finishes brewing.

RESOURCES: cETL approved with advanced safety technology for long lasting durability, and 1-year assurance provided by Chefman, so you can purchase worry-free - we've got your back. For information on how to use your product, scroll down for a PDF User Guide. 1000 Watts/120 Volts – RJ14-12-SQ
body.description: The Chefman Programmable Coffee Maker quickly makes hot and ready coffee in minutes. Now you don’t even have to wait for your favorite cup of coffee to brew! This coffee maker can be programmed to brew at a specific time up to 24 hours in advance. With just the push of a button, your coffee will get ready to brew so you can pour, sip, and go! Its auto shut off function makes it easy to enjoy a delicious, piping hot cup of coffee whenever you want without wondering if you flipped the switch. The bold function also puts you in control of how impactful your cup of joe will be. Pause & serve pouring and anti-drip functions eliminate the wait time as your coffee brews and reduces spills so you can savor every sip. The intuitive digital display and beautiful stainless-steel finish make this a smart, sophisticated addition to any kitchen. Brew up to 12 cups of your favorite coffee fast in the comfort of your own kitchen.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Upgrade Your Morning Coffee The easiest way to get your caffeine fix faster is here with the Chefman Programmable Coffee Maker. Set your sleek stainless steel machine to brew up to 24 hours in advance, so your perfect cup is ready as soon as you are.

Brew Better Than Ever Digital Display Control your coffee with ease using the simple digital display and one-touch presets. Sip on a bolder cup at the push of a button, and clean your brewer in an instant with the built-in cleaning function. Anti-Drip Pouring The sleek glass carafe pours with ease, so you never have to worry about spills on your countertop again. Simply lift from the base using the cool-touch handle and pour – perfect for right or left-handed coffee lovers. Reusable Coffee Filter Save money with the sustainable reusable coffee filter, perfect for brewing your morning cup, or multiple batches for brunch parties, all without the mess and waste of single-use paper coffee filters.

Simply Sleek Design The chic stainless steel finish and ergonomic build of the square coffeemaker are sure to enhance any kitchen counter. With easy-to-control one-touch settings and a digital screen, this is the ideal coffee maker for easier morning brews. Brew up to 12 cups of your favorite blend at once, sure to satisfy any coffee fanatic or a family of casual coffee drinkers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great, compact coffee maker!
reviews.reviewText: This little coffee maker has really saved the morning for me. When my old one failed, it was hard to find another that used No. 4 cone filters. I prefer the flavor of cone-dripped coffee, and this well-sized machine makes a pot much faster than my old one, while taking up less space. It has a really great carafe with an excellent spout for pouring, and even with the "BOLD" switch turned on, delivers fast results. I tried out programming a start time and it was perfect. I'm very happy with this coffee-maker, especially since it cost me a lot less than I was expecting to have to pay.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It is cracking
reviews.reviewText: Ordered on 2/14/23 and today is 3/9/23, so less than a month and plastic parts are cracking and breaking on the base. Photos attached. It’s not leaking, easy to program, not expensive but at this rate it’s not gonna last long. Not sure what to do about it, is it really obvious? It’s brand new, and i’m nuts without my coffee.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid Coffee Pot
reviews.reviewText: Coming from a $20 coffee pot this is a nice upgrade. Keeps the coffee hot but not scalding, quick brew. I like the programmable time setting but it was a bit tricky to figure out how to change it after setting. Only other complaint is that the area to pour water in the reservoir is a bit tight on the right side and I often end up getting water where I don't want it. Besides that good coffee pot, happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Stopped working after 7 mos
reviews.reviewText: Really liked this coffee maker at first - it was simple and efficient and the coffee tasted good. But coffee grounds build up all around the sides of the basket and underneath, and it's a pain to clean the sludge out, and after a while it effected the taste of the coffee. The water overflowed out of the top several times when I made a full pot. It stopped working completely this morning - 7 months to the day after I bought it. Tried all the troubleshooting suggestions but nothing helped.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The best one I ever own thanks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The "drip" head is like a shower - It saves coffee

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars No sound when it shuts off
reviews.reviewText: Yes it’s easy to clean. I use the paper filers instead of the plastic one. I feel the hot plate does not keep the coffee hot enough, and after 2-hours when it shuts down the machine does not make any noise or give you any signal in case you want to keep it on. Which my other machine did. The coffee machine is nice but not great. I’m not sending it back because I should of read more about it.
Funcionó perfecto y es exactamente a la de las imágenes.

reviews.reviewTitle: Es muy práctica y cumple con mis expectativas.
reviews.reviewText: Es muy práctica y si cumple con mis expectativas.
Es un equipo práctico, fácil de operar y limpiar. El café, se de buena calidad, queda excelente.
